resources.string: Where to find the EyeCGas IP Address?
* The rtsp URL should be entered as rtsp://EyeCGas Camera IP Address>/video.sdp \n* In EyeCGas camera navigate to Menu > Settings > System Info > Network > WiFi HotSpot > IP
* For EyeCGas IP = 192.168.1.2 then enter rtsp://192.168.1.5/video.sdp
